name: Escape From St.Louis
description:
English

 Welcome to the mansion of Saint Louis, a mansion in which the family that lived, the St. Louis family, died in 1893, but that mansion was never inhabited again because they encountered paranormal activity.

In 2021, you decided to pay a visit to investigate the sudden death of the St. Louis family

Español

 Bienvenidos a la mansion of Saint Louis, una mansion en la que la familia que vivia, los St.Louis familia, died in 1893, pero esa mansion no volvio a ser hABITADA debido que encontaron actividad paranormal.

In 2021, decidiste hacer una visita para investigar la repentina muerte de la familia St.Louis
